description.en: Thoreum is the world first liquidity mining coin. Thoreum benefit holders by its static rewards of 2% tax fee automatically redistributed to holders. 8% tax fee automatically buy back & burn as Thoreum's mechanism to protect Thoreum price. Together with strategy of limited supply & strongly burnt, Thoreum price is expected not to be reduced gradually as popular farms, but stable & go up steadity along with rarer of Thoreum tokens.
